title: Proactively Handle a Late Shipment
description: A fulfillment delay means an order will not ship on time. The agent must proactively notify the customer.

tasks.description: Identify an order that has passed its expected ship date but has not yet been fulfilled.
Send a proactive email to the customer, apologizing for the delay and providing a new estimated shipping date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a clear and apologetic email.

tasks.description: Offer a small discount on their next purchase as a goodwill gesture.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates and includes a discount code in the email.
